Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 105th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1968...
Injured on 6/5/1971 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/28/1972, off Dock Ellis (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1973, off Dick Hughes (DET)...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/7/1975 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 5/12/1978 to a 1-year deal worth $540,000 per year...
